extendedInfo.description: Earn money on text messagesThe easiest money you'll ever make: Get paid for selling your text messages.1) You usually by packet of text messages, but donât use them up to the end. This text messages donât cost you anything and you could make money on them. Think about price and make an offer using this application.2) You donât buy packet of text messages you just have fixed price for sms. Please join us, add additional margin and offer your text messages too.To sign up you have to provide your mobile number and add destinations with prices.For instance, you subscribed for Vodafone in the UK and you are able to send text messages to every mobile number in the UK for 1c USD. That is nice, because you could resell your text messages, for instance, for 1.5c USD. To do that you have to add destination +44, price for one sms, sent to this destination, and number of text messages that you allow us to send from your mobile phone. Please consider price mentioned earlier just as example, you could think about any price, but take into account that we will choose the best price and if your is too high, we donât guarantee that we will chose your offer.After you will add a new destination, one test text message will be send inside your destination. For instance, to check your +44 destination we will send verification sms from your mobile phone to +447431XXX, which is our mobile phone in that region. We will not pay for this verification sms. That sms will allow us to consider your offer. We will make this verification process for every destination that you will add the application.To get money you could provide your PayPal, Skrill (MoneyBookers) or Payoneer ID in the application. We will be ready to send you money when you earn at least 1 USD, you have to cover money transfer expenses. Like this app? Great. Rate it at the market.The more users using this app, the better the profit will be.Have fun and go make some money!If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to email us at sms@callvia.meTAGS: Easy money, make money, make cash, easy cash, prizes, download apps free, free apps, get paid, work from home, free prizes, free competition, make money with downloadsPayPal, Moneybookers, Skrill, Payoneer, sms, messages, free, text messages, smses
